languages.text: "И все же я не думаю, что Великий Регент почтит нас своим присутствием. После случившегося на Даргонусе весь Дом Орселлио трепещет перед вами, и моя семья едва ли станет рисковать... И потому я передам приглашение Навис Маджорис, нашим лучшим навигаторам. Быть может, Регент отправит в экспедицию кого-то из них".

traits.locale_text: "И все же я не думаю, что Великий Регент почтит нас своим присутствием. После случившегося на Даргонусе весь Дом Орселлио трепещет перед вами, и моя семья едва ли станет рисковать... И потому я передам приглашение Навис Маджорис, нашим лучшим Навигаторам. Быть может, Регент отправит в экспедицию кого-то из них".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Still, I doubt the Great Regent will grace us with his presence. After the events on Dargonus, all of House Orsellio trembles before you, and I doubt that my family will take the risk... Therefore I am going to pass on the invitation to the Navis Majoris, our best Navigators. Perhaps the regent will send one of them on the expedition."
languages.original_text: "И все же я не думаю, что Великий Регент почтит нас своим присутствием. После случившегося на Даргонусе весь Дом Орселлио трепещет перед вами, и моя семья едва ли станет рисковать... И потому я передам приглашение Навис Маджорис, нашим лучшим навигаторам. Быть может, Регент отправит в экспедицию кого-то из них".

traits.locale_text: "Still, I doubt the Great Regent will grace us with her presence. After the events on Dargonus, the entire House Orsellio trembles before you, and I doubt that my family will take the risk... Therefore I am going to pass on the invitation to the Navis Majoris, our best Navigators. Perhaps the Regent will send one of them on the expedition."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Still, I doubt the Great Regent will grace us with her presence. After the events on Dargonus, the entire House Orsellio trembles before you, and I doubt that my family will take the risk... Therefore I am going to pass on the invitation to the Navis Majoris, our best Navigators. Perhaps the Regent will send one of them on the expedition."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Still, I doubt the Great Regent will grace us with her presence. After the events on Dargonus, all of House Orsellio trembles before you, and I doubt that my family will take the risk... Therefore I am going to pass on the invitation to the Navis Majoris, our best Navigators. Perhaps the Regent will send one of them on the expedition."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Still, I doubt the Great Regent will grace us with her presence. After the events on Dargonus, all of House Orsellio trembles before you, and I doubt that my family will take the risk... Therefore I am going to pass on the invitation to the Navis Majoris, our best Navigators. Perhaps the Regent will send one of them on the expedition."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Still, I doubt the Great Regent will grace us with his presence. After the events on Dargonus, all of House Orsellio trembles before you, and I doubt that my family will take the risk... Therefore I am going to pass on the invitation to the Navis Majoris, our best Navigators. Perhaps the regent will send one of them on the expedition."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “不过，我怀疑大摄政王恐怕不会加入这场远征。达戈努斯的事件发生之后，整个奥赛罗家族都对你心有余悸，我怀疑我的家族恐怕不会冒这个险……因此，我打算把邀请函转交给导航圣殿，我们最出色的导航者都在那里。或许摄政王会派遣他们之中的某个人加入这场远征。”
languages.original_text: "Still, I doubt the Great Regent will grace us with his presence. After the events on Dargonus, all of House Orsellio trembles before you, and I doubt that my family will take the risk... Therefore I am going to pass on the invitation to the Navis Majoris, our best Navigators. Perhaps the regent will send one of them on the expedition."

traits.locale_text: “不过，我怀疑大摄政王恐怕不会加入这场远征。达戈努斯的事件发生之后，整个奥塞罗家族都对你心有余悸，我怀疑我的家族恐怕不会冒这个险……因此，我打算把邀请函转交给导航圣殿，我们最出色的导航者都在那里。或许摄政王会派遣他们之中的某个人加入这场远征。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Still, I doubt the Great Regent will grace us with his presence. After the events on Dargonus, all of House Orsellio trembles before you, and I doubt that my family will take the risk... Therefore I am going to pass on the invitation to the Navis Majoris, our best Navigators. Perhaps the regent will send one of them on the expedition."

languages.text: «Sin embargo, dudo que el gran regente acuda personalmente. Tras lo sucedido en Dargonus, la casa Orsellio al completo tiembla ante usted y dudo que mi familia corra el riesgo... Así que enviaré la invitación a la Navis Majoris, nuestros mejores Navegantes. Tal vez el regente envíe a uno de ellos a la expedición».
languages.original_text: "Still, I doubt the Great Regent will grace us with his presence. After the events on Dargonus, all of House Orsellio trembles before you, and I doubt that my family will take the risk... Therefore I am going to pass on the invitation to the Navis Majoris, our best Navigators. Perhaps the regent will send one of them on the expedition."

traits.locale_text: «Sin embargo, dudo que el gran regente acuda personalmente. Tras lo sucedido en Dargonus, la casa Orsellio al completo tiembla ante usted y dudo que mi familia corra el riesgo... Así que enviaré la invitación a la Navis Majoris, nuestros mejores Navegantes. Tal vez el regente envíe a uno de ellos a la expedición».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「それでも、グレート・リージェントが私たちを歓迎してくださるとは思えません。ダルゴナスでの出来事の後では、オーセリオ家すべてがあなたに震え上がるでしょう。そして、我が一族は危険を冒したがりはしません…ですから、私はネイビス・マジョリス、つまり最高の航宙士たちに招待を送るつもりです。おそらく摂政は、彼らのうちの一人を遠征に送るでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Still, I doubt the Great Regent will grace us with his presence. After the events on Dargonus, all of House Orsellio trembles before you, and I doubt that my family will take the risk... Therefore I am going to pass on the invitation to the Navis Majoris, our best Navigators. Perhaps the regent will send one of them on the expedition."

traits.locale_text: 「それでも、グレート・リージェントが私たちを歓迎してくださるとは思えません。ダルゴナスでの出来事の後では、オーセリオ家すべてがあなたに震え上がるでしょう。そして、我が一族は危険を冒したがりはしません…ですから、私はネイビス・マジョリス、つまり最高の航宙士たちに招待を送るつもりです。おそらく摂政は、彼らのうちの一人を遠征に送るでしょう」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Doch ich bezweifle, dass der Großregent uns mit seiner Anwesenheit beehren wird. Nach den Ereignissen auf Dargonus erzittert das gesamte Haus Orsellio vor Euch, und meine Familie wird das Risiko wohl kaum eingehen ... Ich werde die Einladung daher an die Navis Majoris weitergeben, unsere besten Navigatoren. Vielleicht schickt der Regent einen von ihnen auf die Expedition."
languages.original_text: "Still, I doubt the Great Regent will grace us with his presence. After the events on Dargonus, all of House Orsellio trembles before you, and I doubt that my family will take the risk... Therefore I am going to pass on the invitation to the Navis Majoris, our best Navigators. Perhaps the regent will send one of them on the expedition."

traits.locale_text: "Doch ich bezweifle, dass der Großregent uns mit seiner Anwesenheit beehren wird. Nach den Ereignissen auf Dargonus erzittert das gesamte Haus Orsellio vor Euch, und meine Familie wird das Risiko wohl kaum eingehen ... Ich werde die Einladung daher an die Navis Majoris weitergeben, unsere besten Navigatoren. Vielleicht schickt der Regent einen von ihnen auf die Expedition."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Cela dit, je doute que le vénérable régent nous fasse l'honneur de sa présence. Depuis les événements de Dargonus, la simple mention de votre nom fait trembler la maison Orsellio. Il est donc peu probable que ma famille prenne ce risque... Je transmettrai néanmoins l'invitation à la Navis Majoris, qui regroupe nos meilleurs navigateurs. Peut-être le régent acceptera-t-il d'envoyer l'un d'entre eux en expédition avec nous. »
languages.original_text: "Still, I doubt the Great Regent will grace us with his presence. After the events on Dargonus, all of House Orsellio trembles before you, and I doubt that my family will take the risk... Therefore I am going to pass on the invitation to the Navis Majoris, our best Navigators. Perhaps the regent will send one of them on the expedition."

traits.locale_text: « Cela dit, je doute que le vénérable régent nous fasse l'honneur de sa présence. Depuis les événements de Dargonus, la simple mention de votre nom fait trembler la maison Orsellio. Il est donc peu probable que ma famille prenne ce risque... Je transmettrai néanmoins l'invitation à la Navis Majoris, qui regroupe nos meilleurs navigateurs. Peut-être le régent acceptera-t-il d'envoyer l'un d'entre eux en expédition avec nous. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Yine de Yüce Naip'in teşrif edeceğini sanmıyorum. Dargonus'ta olanlardan sonra Orsellio Hanesi'nde senden korkmayan kalmadı. Ailemin böyle bir riske girmeyi göze alacağını sanmıyorum. Bu yüzden de bu çağrıyı Navis Majoris'e, en iyi Rotacılarımıza ileteceğim. Belki naip, içlerinden birini gönderir."
languages.original_text: "Still, I doubt the Great Regent will grace us with his presence. After the events on Dargonus, all of House Orsellio trembles before you, and I doubt that my family will take the risk... Therefore I am going to pass on the invitation to the Navis Majoris, our best Navigators. Perhaps the regent will send one of them on the expedition."

traits.locale_text: "Yine de Yüce Naip'in teşrif edeceğini sanmıyorum. Dargonus'ta olanlardan sonra Orsellio Hanesi karşında tir tir titriyor. Ailemin o riski göze alacağını sanmam... Bu yüzden de bu çağrıyı en iyi Rotacılarımız olan Navis Majoris'e ileteceğim. Belki naip, onlardan birini keşif gezisine gönderir."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
